body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary A. Johnson Bone in Robertson County, Tennessee, on October 12, 1845. Father of Sarah E. Bone, Blackman A. L. Bone, Mary A. Bone, and Samuel J. Bone. Farmer in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1860.
